message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to use this site, you accept our cookie policy.
title: Cookie Policy
intro: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience.
what_are_cookies_description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us enhance your experience and understand user behavior.
how_we_use_cookies_description: We use cookies for analytics, improving site performance, and remembering your preferences.
types_of_cookies_description: We use essential, analytics, and functional cookies to improve our service.
managing_cookies_description: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings.
changes_description: We may update this policy from time to time. Continued use of our service implies acceptance of changes.
